title: Getting Started
text: dbProject package provides user-friendly approach creating managaing local database connection. relies pins connections R packages. dbProject objects R6 object contains pinned connection object pinned objects user-specified directory known pins_board. reasons might want use dbProject approach : Reconnecting database necessary (e.g. restarting R disconnecting). Saving lazy database tables. Performing common database connection handling operations (e.g. connect, reconnect, etc).

Note dbProject objects R6 objects, access object’s methods using $ operator. Best practice: Assign database paths variables passing dbProject$new(). ensures proper path resolution connection persistence. dbProject$print() method run whenever object printed. displays path board attributes object, well contents board.
